definition: Nicolas Sarkozy (1955-), French UMP politician, President 2007-2012
Bodhisattva/surname Sa
branch of study/administrative section/division/field/branch/stage directions/family (taxonomy)/rules/laws/to mete out (punishment)/to levy (taxes etc)/to fine sb/CL:個|个[ge4]
(name of states and dynasties at several different periods)/surname Qi
neat/even/level with/identical/simultaneous/all together/to even sth out

sentences.english: Both Mr Woerth and Mr Sarkozy deny any wrongdoing in the case.
sentences.chinese: 韦尔特和萨科齐都否认在这个案件里做过任何错事。

sentences.english: Mr Sarkozy, though, is nothing if not a risk-taker.
sentences.chinese: 毫无疑问，萨科齐是一个十足的冒险家。

sentences.english: Third, Mr Sarkozy is ready to confront France's bastions of conservatism.
sentences.chinese: 第三，萨科齐先生准备好面对法国保守主义的堡垒。

sentences.english: Yes, that's French President Nicholas Sarkozy with striped underwear on his head.
sentences.chinese: 下面这张图是法国总统萨科齐顶着一条条纹内裤。

sentences.english: Does China have any message for President Sarkozy?
sentences.chinese: 中方是否有口信要传递给萨科齐总统？

sentences.english: Could this be the start of something special? "Obama is my buddy," French President Nicolas Sarkozy said.
sentences.chinese: 法国总统萨科齐曾说，“奥巴马是我的朋友。

sentences.english: President Nicolas Sarkozy has said all French troops will be withdrawn from Afghanistan by 2014.
sentences.chinese: 总统萨科齐说道所有法国部队将会在2014年撤出。

sentences.english: Her French counter-part, President Nicolas Sarkozy also sent his congratulations.
sentences.chinese: 法国总统萨科齐也发出恭贺。

sentences.english: And in any case, he is unlikely to be deterred by diplomatic niceties .
sentences.chinese: 不管那种情况，萨科齐都不大可能受局与外交礼节。

sentences.english: Sarkozy is set to visit Mont Saint Michel in Normandy, France that day.
sentences.chinese: 萨科齐将访问圣米歇尔山在诺曼底，法国那一天。

sentences.english: The man accused Sarkozy of " dirtying me."
sentences.chinese: 那人辱骂萨科齐弄脏了他。

sentences.english: Mrs Merkel and Mr Sarkozy did not say how recapitalisation will proceed;
sentences.chinese: 默克尔和萨科齐并没有说明资本调整将如何进行。

sentences.english: Mr Sarkozy, it appears, did not cave in entirely to Mr Hu.
sentences.chinese: 看起来萨科齐并没有完全屈服于胡。

sentences.english: One year on, in short, Mr Sarkozy has delivered less than he promised.
sentences.chinese: 简而言之，一年过去了，萨科齐未能完全履行诺言。

sentences.english: For instance, French president Nicolas Sarkozy loves fried wonton.
sentences.chinese: 如法国总统萨科齐爱吃炸馄饨。

sentences.english: Mr. Sarkozy is traveling with a high-level business delegation.
sentences.chinese: 萨科齐率领的是一个高级商务代表团。

Netanyahu (name)/Benjamin Netanyahu (1949-), Israeli Likud politician, prime minister 1996-1999 and from 2009
